entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
